message.entry: Initial seed regions or "scribbles" overlap. The scribbles specified by {0} (regions that are logical true) should not overlap.
The initial seed regions or "scribble" provided in {0} is empty, i.e. no pixels have been marked as logical true. Valid, non-empty scribbles must be provided for all the regions.
Update not possible. No initial segmentation exists. Call SEGMENT method instead.
